response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, we believe it's worth more than what others have paid. Considering its true value and the investment it represents, I'm offering it to you for $125. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you based on your interest and the perceived value you would derive from it. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the excellence of our product at an exclusive price. Let me know if you're interested, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 125}
